summary: I am 3rd-year student studying Business Administration at the University of Amsterdam (UVA). With a passion for strategy and a solid background in business processes, firm strategy, and product management, I have gained valuable experience over the past 2 years. I am now excited to embark on a journey in the consulting and supply chain management fields to apply my skills and continue learning.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description:
I have experience managing websites and content for Philips and AOC monitors, where my role encompassed a combination of marketing, product management, and web development. My main focus was on product activations, portal development, and website content production. Throughout my tenure, I gained expertise in working with complex product management systems such as INRIVER and UTOMO.

In addition, I successfully launched various seasonal campaigns, including AOC Black Friday and Christmas gifting guide, among others. These campaigns involved strategizing, executing, and tracking their performance to ensure optimal results. I also closely monitored SEO/SEA/SEM analysis to evaluate the website's performance and make data-driven improvements.

My role required a strong understanding of marketing principles, web development technologies, and content creation strategies. I collaborated with cross-functional teams, including design, development, and marketing, to deliver engaging and effective online experiences. Overall, my experience in managing websites and content for Philips and AOC monitors has equipped me with a comprehensive skill set to drive successful digital campaigns and enhance online presence.
profile_positions.title: Philips Online Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
During my internship, I had the opportunity to work in various departments, including technical and commercial product management, at Google for Pixel products. In the technical product management department, I gained valuable insights into the commercial pricing strategies for Google Pixel products. This involved understanding market dynamics, analyzing competitors' pricing, and contributing to pricing recommendations.

Toward the end of my internship, I had the opportunity to submit a proposal for a potential product. I focused on creating a dog collar with RFID and Area fencing features. This involved conducting market research, identifying customer needs, conceptualizing the product, and outlining its potential benefits. The proposal encompassed detailed product specifications, target audience analysis, and a comprehensive business case.

Throughout my internship, I actively collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, marketers, and analysts. This experience provided me with a well-rounded understanding of product development, pricing strategies, website analytics, and the importance of customer-centric innovation.
profile_positions.title: Business Intern

profile_positions.description:
During my professional journey, I had the opportunity to delve into the fundamentals of finance and risk management analysis. This experience allowed me to gain a solid understanding of these disciplines and their importance in decision-making processes.

In the field of finance, I explored key concepts such as financial statements, cash flow analysis, and financial ratios. I learned how to interpret and analyze financial data to assess the financial health and performance of companies. This knowledge helped me understand how financial decisions impact business operations and overall organizational goals.

Additionally, I delved into risk management analysis, which involved identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks that could impact business operations or financial stability. I learned how to conduct risk assessments, develop risk management strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of risk mitigation measures. Understanding risk management allowed me to appreciate the importance of proactive planning and contingency measures to protect against potential threats.

By exploring the basics of finance and risk management analysis, I developed skills that enable me to make informed financial decisions, evaluate investment opportunities, and assess the potential risks associated with various business activities. This knowledge has proven valuable in understanding the financial landscape and effectively managing uncertainties in diverse professional environments.
profile_positions.title: Summer Finance Intern

volunteer_experiences.description: Several Schools in India run on Mid day Meal schemes which motivates poor families to send children to school and prevent them from work in factories and fields, hence reduce child labour. My goal was to arrange funds for  mid day meal scheme of the government schools in India.
Helped Children with special needs to teach them basic computer skills. For example using Microsoft Excel and focusing on making them independent in life
